divs: Sighting Details I have seen many unidentified flying objects over the past year. This past week, an object has shown up several nights in the Western sky and has hovered for quite a while before disappearing. Tonight,I went outside to see if the object had returned. The weird thing was that as soon as I went out my front door, the object pulled up as if it were a car stopping at a 3-way stop. I first viewed the object with my weak binoculars and then commenced to take a picture. I started to take a second picture, but the object vanished! This amazed me as this object, as well as previous objects, have hovered around for several hours in the past. During this sighting, a commercial airplane passed by the object; I live near the flight path of Lunken Airport in Cincinnati, Ohio.
Summary: really strange ufo occurrence in Campbell County, KY
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Fort Thomas
There were no other sightings in Fort Thomas on or around October 2nd 2013
